name: factorial
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the product of (= the result of multiplying) a whole number and all the whole numbers below it: The factorial of five (5 x 4 x 3 x 2 x 1) is 120. Four factorial (4 x 3 x 2 x 1) is 24.
More examplesFewer examplesThe factorial of a number n is n*n-1 *n-2*... *1.Assume that you have a simple method that calculates the factorial of a number. This result can be written concisely in terms of factorials.
